required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of TQB3820 in Patients With Hematological Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Study to Evaluate the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of TQB3820 in Relapsed or Refractory Multiple Myeloma (R/R MM) or Relapsed or Refractory Indolent B-cell Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma (R/R B-NHL)

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: TQB3820 is a novel cereblon-modulating agent. Upon binding to cereblon, a substrate receptor in the cullin4 E3 ligase complex, TQB3820 promotes recruitment, ubiquitination, and subsequent proteasomal degradation of the hematopoietic transcription factors Ikaros (IKZF1) and Aiolos (IKZF3). Modulation of Aiolos and Ikaros expression has the potential to correct multiple aspects of the immune dysregulation mediated by B cells.

primary_outcome.description: DLT describes side effects of a drug or other treatment that are serious enough to prevent an increase in dose or level of that treatment.
The maximum Dose at which less than 33% subjects experiencing DLT
RP2D will be based on evaluation of clinical safety and tolerability and guided by accumulating pharmacokinetics (PK) data
Type, frequency, seriousness and severity of adverse events and laboratory abnormalities, such as hyperuricemia.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0 (pre-dose), 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours post-dose on single dose ; Hour 0(pre-dose) of day1, day8, day15, day22 on multiple dose and 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours post-dose on multiple dose of day28)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum(peak )plasma concentration following drug administration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0(pre-dose), 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours post-dose on single dose ; Hour 0(pre-dose) of day1, day8, day15, day22 on multiple dose and 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours post-dose on multiple dose of day28)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to Maximum plasma concentration of drug

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 0 (pre-dose), 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours post-dose on single dose ; Hour 0 (pre-dose) of day1, day8, day15, day22 on multiple dose and 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours post-dose on multiple dose of day28)

secondary_outcome.description: The sum of percentage of participants with stringent complete response rate, complete response rate, very good partial response, partial response rate in MM The sum of percentage of participants with complete response rate, partial response rate for B-NHL
The sum of percentage of participants with stringent complete response rate, complete response rate, very good partial response, partial response rate, minimal response rate in MM
Time from the first date of dose to the first date of documented response (partial response [PR] or greater).
Time from the first documentation of response (PR or greater) to the first documentation of Progressive disease (PD) or death from any cause, whichever occurs first
Time from the first dose to the first documentation of PD or death from any cause, whichever occurs first
Time from the first dose to death due to any cause

arm_group.description: TQB3820 tablets are administrated orally on Days 1-28 of each 28-day treatment cycle. Dose escalation of TQB3820 will be based on evaluation of clinical safety and tolerability and guided by accumulating PK data.

intervention.description: TQB3820 is a novel cereblon-modulating agent.

facility.name: Affiliated Beijing Chaoyang Hospital of Capital Medical University
Institute of Hematology and Blood Disease Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences and Peking Union Medical College
